content.text:
# 1964 United Kingdom local elections

The 1964 United Kingdom local elections took place in April and May 1964.
London boroughs
The inaugural elections in London boroughs:
* 1964 Barking London Borough Council election
* 1964 Barnet London Borough Council election
* 1964 Bexley London Borough Council election
* 1964 Brent London Borough Council election
* 1964 Bromley London Borough Council election
* 1964 Camden London Borough Council election
* 1964 Croydon London Borough Council election
* 1964 Ealing London Borough Council election
* 1964 Enfield London Borough Council election
* 1964 Hackney London Borough Council election
* 1964 Hammersmith London Borough Council election
* 1964 Haringey London Borough Council election
* 1964 Harrow London Borough Council election
* 1964 Havering London Borough Council election
* 1964 Hillingdon London Borough Council election
* 1964 Hounslow London Borough Council election
* 1964 Islington London Borough Council election
* 1964 Kingston upon Thames London Borough Council election
* 1964 Merton London Borough Council election
* 1964 Newham London Borough Council election
* 1964 Redbridge London Borough Council election
* 1964 Sutton London Borough Council election
* 1964 Tower Hamlets London Borough Council election
* 1964 Waltham Forest London Borough Council election
* 1964 Wandsworth London Borough Council election
* 1964 Westminster City Council election
* 1964 Greenwich London Borough Council election
* 1964 Kensington and Chelsea London Borough Council election
* 1964 Lambeth London Borough Council election
* 1964 Lewisham London Borough Council election
* 1964 Richmond upon Thames London Borough Council election
* 1964 Southwark London Borough Council election
